question: 1840 crew members are going on a trip. If they hire 36 buses and each bus has a capacity of 19 seats, how many crew members will not get seats?

5566 students are going on a trip. If they hire 62 buses and each bus has a capacity of 44 seats, how many students will not get seats?
Robin once read a list of the tallest people in the world. One of them was 450 feet tall! That is just 9 times of Robin height. How tall is Robin in feet?

Francis has 12 cars. Francis gives the cars on rent, each for 984 dollars per day. On Saturday he does not take any money for them. In a week, how much does he earn from 11 cars?

If a person who owns a school earns 85 dollars in a day, how much will he earn in 769 years?
Two teachers plan to jog along a 308 cm trail, starting at opposite ends of the trail at the same time. If O's rate is 32 % faster than P's, how many cm will O have walked when they pass each other?

The speed at which a man can row a boat in still water is 397 milesphr. If he rows downstream, where the speed of current is 262 milesphr, what time in sec will he take to cover 92 km?
